name: gBurner Project File
summary: Learn about .GBI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: gBurner supports CD-R, CD-RW, DVD-R, DVD+R, DVD-RW, DVD+RW, DVD-R DL, DVD+R DL, and DVD-RAM discs.

description: Disk authoring project created with gBurner, a CD/DVD burning tool; stores a list of files and disc burning settings; can be used to create data and audio CDs, DVDs, bootable disks, and multisession CDs and DVDs.
